rules_text:
Haste
[i]Blade and Bow[/i] – As long as Brigid is untapped, she has reach. As long as Brigid is tapped, she has first strike.
[i]Leader of the Fiana Freeblades[/i] – Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Brigid deals combat damage to a player, up to three target creatures you control explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
